content: New Main Story Pack released: [[Lucent Historia]]:
* [[Lament Rain]] // Ashrount vs. 打打だいず
** Certain conditions must be met to unlock this Partner after obtaining "Lucent Historia".
[[Insight (Ascendant - 8th Seeker)/Lacrymira]] can now be equipped after reaching Level 20.
Returning Partner as part of the collaboration:
* Stories progress towards the right, rather than upwards.
* Hints provided on how to trigger past Anomalies.
* PV replayability in [[Axiom of the End]] with sealed [[Hikari (Fatalis)]].
* The Stamina cost of a given Map shown on the Map icon.
* [[Kanae]]'s Awakened Skill adjusted with the introduction of 0-Stamina Maps.
* Main Story Chronicle available at a discounted price.
name: Lucent Historia

content: Support for 120hz on iPhone 13 Pro added
New song added to [[Extend Archive 1|World Extend]]:
*[[G e n g a o z o]] / -45
World Extend pack is now structured like regular packs
*Fragments are gained during play just as in Music Play
*Several maps have had their play cost reduced to one Stamina and had Play+ enabled:
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 2 Mobile#2-1 Extra Originals|2-1 Extra Originals]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 3 Mobile#3-1 Light III|3-1 Spire Light]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 3 Mobile#3-2 Conflict III|3-2 Spire Conflict]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 3 Mobile#3-5 Conflict IV|3-5 Spire Conflict 2]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 4 Mobile#4-2 Light IV|4-2 Ripples]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 4 Mobile#4-3 Conflict V|4-3 Waves]]
**[[World Mode Data Chapter 4 Mobile#4-7 Contest 2019|4-7 The Calm]]
Ether Drops are now awarded upon purchasing Packs/Memory Archive songs, equating to 1 Ether Drop per 100 Memories spent.
*Logging in for the first time since the update will award the player all the Ether Drops for the Packs/songs they've already bought.
Fragments are split into three stacks of 9,999 Fragments each, allowing for a total of 29,997 Fragments
